documents.document:
Invest in Panama real estate and reap great benefits

Homes in Altos del Maria provide one with breathtaking views of mountains, valleys and rivers. The scenic location also has a comfortable mountain climate, with a temperature of about 24 degrees Celsius throughout the year. Altos Del Maria is 25 minutes away from the Pacific beaches, and 1 hour and 30 minutes away from the Panama City. Due to its location, Panama real estate is widely preferred among retired persons.

From locations in Altos del Maria, beautiful landscapes such as the mountains and the Pacific Ocean can be observed. Permanent staff dedicated to gardening are employed here, to make sure that the artificial landscape is maintained. This makes the house owners feel as though they are living in a garden within the mountains. Lush green golf courses and business centers are within a drive of 20 minutes.

Quality infrastructure has between provided in an area of 1500 hectares, located between mountains and valleys. A community center, a natural pool adjacent to a waterfall and a heliport have been provided, whereas the homes have facilities for potable water and electricity, along with internet and satellite TV. Six kilometers of bridges, sidewalks and gazebos are also provided around the Panama homes. In some homes located at high altitudes, fireplaces are used for cold nights. But on an average, there are no sharp variations in temperature. In fact, warmer climate can be experienced at the beaches, located within a short distance.

Altos Del Maria is a part of the gated mountain communities, where only members and their guests are allowed entry. This is the third project of its kind, a mountainous residential community, which has been built by the Real Estate Division of Grupo Melo. An investment in Panama properties can surely be considered as an investment of a lifetime.

A best place to retire – Panama

Real estate panama stands at top among the best places to retire in the whole world. Many communities have been built with a consideration of all requirements of the retirees ranging from security to shopping. In today's time, the life moves at a swift pace and senior citizens somewhere feel the requirement of a different place to spend their rest of life peacefully by putting aside all worries.

For such a hassle free life along with all modern conveniences in proximity, real estate panama beckons retirees and senior citizens to choose their dream home to spend their rest of life in a setting that sets right amidst the nature's bounty. These communities have been offering complete safe environment to its residents and all facilities are made available to them at a very short distance.

As the place is replete with lush green landscapes comprising a wide variety of vegetation, senior citizens find the place highly serene and the richness of nature has the healing touch that prolongs their life. The houses are built with fine architectural designs and specifically designed to suit old age people. Though real estate panama lies away from city's hustle and bustle, residents do not have to drive long for shopping as the venues for shopping are available just a few minutes walk from their home.

Life is a vacation after retiring from the job; people can live up to the fullest and enjoy their life in every way they have ever dreamed. For pleasure, residents have the facility for golfing, small lakes ideal for fishing and several treks that can lift their spirits up. Medical amenities are also available in proximity as after safety it becomes one of the foremost requirement of senior citizens.

Retire in Panama-the heaven on earth

Central America's southernmost country, Panama, is outlined by the Caribbean region to its north and bordered by Columbia and Costa Rica. It is one of the fastest growing economies in the Central America and is rich in flora and fauna, which makes it a preferred destination for commercial as well as tourist purposes. With its exuberant and vibrant surroundings, Panama offers a serene and peaceful accommodation. The ethereal beauty of the place has lead to the growth of tourism, which has eventually resulted in the growth of real estate business. The natural beauty, growth of Panama real estates and the Panama Pensionado Program, a package offered to people who have reached their retirement age to retire in Panama has made Panama one of the best travel destinations. By applying for the Pensionado Program, people are allowed to stay permanently in the country and are granted residence.

http://www.retirement-review.com/retirement-international/wp-content/uploads/2009/03/altowww.jpg

A plan to retire in Panama would prove fruitful as the country assures that the stay is both entertaining as well as comfortable. The country is a melting pot and assures an affordable and standard living. It offers both a warm and a cool stay to its visitors. While the tropic displays kaleidoscopic colors and offer a warm stay, the lush green mountains that cuddle the clouds provide a refreshing and cool experience. The mountain towns of Volcán, Boquete, Caldera and Cerro Punta are some of the well-known tourist places of the country. Highlands of the volcano can be explored during sightseeing trips to these towns. Holding more than hundred records of world fishing, Panama is an ideal spot to enjoy fishing and also indulge in exciting activities like deep sea diving in the pristine Pacific and the Caribbean, and surfing in the famous spots like Punta Catalina and Playa Venado.

Panama- The best place to retire

One of the fastest growing economies in Central America, Panama is a preferred destination for commercial as purposes. The country is outlined by the Caribbean region to its north and is bordered by Costa Rica and Columbia. The country is also rich in flora and fauna and offers a serene stay in the countryside that brims with exuberant greenery and features vibrant surroundings. The ethereal beauty of the place has eventually lead to the growth of Panama real estate business sector, as most of the travelers visiting the city consider this city as the best place to retire and opt to continue their living in this peaceful destination. Moreover, the government provides an exquisitely designed pension package to its visitors, known as Panama Pensionado Program. This package can be availed by tourists or residents who have attained their retirement age, irrespective of their citizenship. Under this offer, they are provided with a residence and are granted permission to reside in the country after their retirement. Exemption of taxes discounts on traveling, medication, entertainment, dining and many more are provided to the eligible residents, after their application for retirement is granted by the government

While the Panama City offers a luxurious living with its state-of-the-art facilities, the countryside is an ideal retreat for those who wish to retire in a peaceful surrounding, away from the hustle and bustle of the city life. The vibrant surroundings, with its exuberance, assure a comfortable and stress-relieving living. Being a melting pot, Panama is the Best place to retire in US as one can find a wide array of cultures and races of people here. In addition to Panama real estate sector, the country is growing in the field of medical tourism, with its link with the famous US medical colleges.

Benefits of Purchasing Panama Homes

One of the most developed countries in Latin America, Panama is reckoned for its rich culture, heritage, civilization and wildlife. With consistent growth in international trade and finance, Panama has become a hub of real-estate across the Central America. There are several factors beneficial for investing in Panama properties, which makes it a smart decision for the buyers.It is profitable to purchase property in Panamabecause of numerous tax benefits and easy financing which make Panama properties highly affordable. In addition, there are several special discounts for senior citizens and Pensionados (retirees) who are looking forward to purchase Panama properties. This is one of the biggest factors why people move to Panama. Owing to several benefits such as modern transportation, medical facilities and telecommunication facilities such as Wi-Fi, cellular coverage and direct TV services, individuals prefer investing in Panama properties.The weather in Panama is favorable all year long as the place is surrounded by Caribbean Sea in the north and the Pacific Ocean on the south. Popular beaches and golf courses are some of the other factors that appeal individuals to buy a Panama home. Moreover, individuals can easily find hotels, salons, restaurants, spas and malls all across the city. The advantage of living in Panama is not only limited to natural beauty and luxuries. Located in Central America, the country has American influence in all its prospects. US Dollar has been legally accepted by the country as its paper currency. This helps the American nationals, who decide to buy Panama properties, not to go through the tedious process synonymous with exchanging currency.For more information, visit the website www.altosdelmaria.comPanama

Panama City– The Perfect Place to Invest in Real Estate

People planning to retire wish for an abode that can take them away from the chaotic urban life. Therefore, they want to invest their hard earned money in a real estate that can bring them closer to the nature. According to a survey, property in Panama is the foremost choice of the retirees. Panama City has numerous retirement communities and Altos del Maria is among the popular ones. Retirees planning to invest in Panama properties can enjoy the beautiful view of mountains, rivers, streams and valleys.Investing inPanama properties is profitable as there are numerous discount policies initiated by the Government of Panama. Asturias, La Rioca, Granada and Santiago Apostol are the sub-divisions where the size of home lots ranges from 1,000 square meters to 8,000 square meters. Monte Azul, Verona, Mont Blanc, San Carlos and Garda are some of the home models constructed in Panama City. The cost of these models depends upon the topography, size and the location.As mentioned before, several discount policies have been formulated by the Panamanian Government in order to attract foreign investors. Retirees benefit the most from these policies as there is a separate Retirement Law. The discounts under these law are applicable on almost everything namely, restaurants, hotels, transportation, hospitals, phone and telephone bills. The retired people who are looking forward to purchase property in Panama can also avail the benefit of 24x7 security. Apart from discounts, retirees can choose to undertake hiking, swimming, bird watching and horseback riding at places near the residential community. With all these advantages, buying property in Panama becomes the ideal choice.For more information, visit www.altosdelmaria.comPanama

Ideal Investment in Panama Properties

Nowadays, more and more people are buying Panama properties due to high return on investment. It is because of this reason that government of Panama gives huge benefits to the foreigners who buy property in Panama. People who wish to spend time in an environment filled with natural splendor then buying property in Panama is the best option. The city has many residential communities which are laced with the latest and quality facilities.

One such community is Altos del Maria which is situated in proximity to the Panama City. The community is fully dedicated towards the safety and well being of the residents. The property in Panama includes numerous parks, tennis court in Valencia, restaurants and community centers. In addition to these, an activity center and a first aid attention center, which are ready to use, are also present in Panama. The activity center has an open area where residents can work out. The gym is well equipped with all the requisite equipment such as dumbbells, a ping-pong table, a pool table and many more. These facilities attract people from all over to invest in Panama properties.

With the increasing demand of Panama properties, numerous people are in search of perfect destination to settle down. The real estate sector of Panama is flourishing at a rapid pace due to its infrastructure, spectacular natural beauty and minimum cost of living. The easy availability of local shops, latest communication facilities and complete surveillance round the clock make the place ideal for investment. Moreover, it is easier to avail property in the country due to easy financing and tax benefits.

For further information, please log on to www.altosdelmaria.com

Affordable Home at Panama City

Everyone wants to invest their hard earned money in profitable sectors. Real estate is the most booming sector, which provides higher returns. As per reports, most people are looking for homes in areas, which are rich in natural beauty. Panama City, located in the Central America is one such region and it is considered as one of the ideal regions for real estate investment. Panama homes are designed and built keeping in mind the view, size and topography. Panama City has various beautiful communities and among them Altos del Maria holds prime position. This community is 1 hour and 20 minutes drive from the PanamaPanama City and is sprawled over an area of more than 7000 acres.

The Government of Panama has initiated certain discount plans for Panama property in order to attract foreign investors. Verona, San Carlos, Mont Blanc, Monte Azul and Garda are some of the home models, which differ in prize, size and location. If the house model does not suit the available budget then home loans are provided at low rate of interest. Panama homes have been constructed in Colonial Spanish style and U.S. Southwestern style.

People who are looking forward to purchase Panama homes can enjoy the view of Pacific Ocean, valleys and mountains. Waterfalls, lookout points, bridges, rivers, streams, parks and creeks make it possible to undertake swimming, hiking, bird-watching and horse back riding. Buena Vista, Los Canjilones and Chorro Macho are among those places that are suitable for hiking. Numerous top class restaurants, cafes, hospitals and shopping complexes are situated near the community.

Residents of Panama homes have access to satellite TV, speedy internet and wireless telephone services. People living in Panama City do not have to be concerned about their safety as security personnel is present outside the gates of community who makes sure to restrict the entry of unauthorized persons.

For more information, visit www.altosdelmaria.com

Perfect Residential Solutions in Panama

Buying a property has always been a tough decision for people and especially for the retirees. In order to enjoy comfort living at the stage of retirement, a suitable place with a good accommodation is essential. One such place, which fulfills these requirements is the residential community located in the Panama valley.

Altos del Maria, which has been the prime residential community in the Panama valley, is involved in providing quality homes. Being surrounded by trees and mountains, residences at this place offers a whole new experience. The homes at the residential communities like Altos del Maria are fully facilitated with all the advancements of a modern living such as high-end connectivity of cellular phones and internet, water, electricity and satellite TV.

The communities in the Panama valley are fully dedicated towards the safety and well being of their owners. In order to make the living more enjoyable, Altos del Maria has two parks, a fulbito court and a tennis court in Valencia situated nearby the Río María Bridge. Apart from these, the place also has world class golf courses and fine restaurants.

The close proximity of exotic beaches with the residences enhances the mood of the residents. This community is a part of Panama real estate and it is also one of the best places for investment. In addition, the new facilities at this place include an activity center and a first aid attention center, which are ready to use.

The activity center has an open area where residents can perform different types of physical exercises. To add on to the advancement, the gym is equipped with all the latest equipment. Owing to all these advancements and standard of living at this place, Altos del Maria has been considered as the best place for investment in the Panama real estate sector.

For further information, visit the website www.altosdelmaria.com

Experience the Beauty of Nature in Panama City

All of us want to spend time closer to nature which provides peace, both physically and mentally. With urbanization taking its toll on natural surroundings, it has become almost impossible to find any scenic beauty. Panama City, located in the Central America, is visited by people for its real estate properties that have been constructed in the lap of nature.

People looking forward to invest in Panama real estate can choose from numerous home models, namely San Carlos, Verona, Monte Azul, Garda and Mont Blanc. These home models have been built in Colonial Spanish style and U.S. Southwestern style. People can construct and design their dream home by taking assistance of experienced architects and builders of Panama.

By choosing to invest in Panama real estate, people can avail the benefits of numerous discount policies initiated by the Panamanian Government. Besides, there is a special Retirement Law that enables retirees to avail discounts on almost everything they spend on. It is said that any individual above the age of 18 can become a retiree and avail the discounts stated under the Retirement Law.

Outsiders investing in Panama real estate are given coveted status because of certain tax visa rules. Retirees are offered 50% concession for buying real estate in Panama City. This policy allows the retired people to save their hard earned money for other important purposes. Elderly are given 25% discount on all types of restaurant meals. 20% and 15% are offered on doctor’s visit and hospital bills respectively. While traveling by bus, train and boat, retirees get the discount of 50%. With innumerable discounts, Panama City can be chosen by people for its low cost of living.

For more information, visit www.altosdelmaria.com

A Unique Appeal of Living in Panama

nama is a popular country throughout the world that is known for its scenic beauty and ideal living conditions. It is a Latin American country that enjoys pleasant weather all round the year. The country has affordable living conditions with relaxed visa regulations that attract number of foreigners. People prefer to settle in this country due to low cost of living and the safety which it offers.

Investing in Panama real estate becomes an ideal choice for senior citizens as the country runs a pensionado programme. According to this programme, retirees enjoy numerous discounts. While purchasing homes in Panama, the seniors are completely exempted from property taxes. Moreover, 50% discount is offered to the retired senior citizens buying home in communities like Altos del Maria.

With the development of Panama real estate, numerous gated communities have emerged that provide all the necessary facilities. The well developed infrastructure, communication facilities and 24x7 security have made this place ideal for comfortable living. Besides, activities like golfing, hiking, bird watching and horseback riding can also be enjoyed in the country. Some of the finest restaurants, golf courses and beautiful beaches are situated near the communities.

Apart from this, travelers visiting the country require a passport valid for at least three months after arrival. Travelers should also have return or onward tickets, necessary documents for next destination and sufficient funds. However, tourists must check the Panamanian entry requirements before planning a trip as these are subject to change. The lax visa rules are applicable in the country which enables foreign citizens enjoy the coveted status as long as their stay in Panama.

For more information, please visit www.altosdelmaria.com

Panama Real Estate for both Investment and Living

Panama is situated at the isthmus of North and South America and is popularly known as ‘Crossroads of the Americas’. The country has beautiful landscapes and pleasant climate all round the year that makes it suitable for living. Retirees or senior citizens prefer to spend quality time in this country as various policies are devised by the government in their favor. The relaxed visa regulations and low cost of living attracts several American expatriates and investors to bank on Panama real estate. It also allows individuals to make a stay in the country for as long as they want.

Panama realestate sector has gained prominence all across the globe as the pensionado programme allows an individual to enjoy the benefit of tax exemption. The retirees are provided 50 per cent of discount on purchase of real estate Panama. This also leads to further savings for those who plan to settle in this country. One of the popular Panama realestate divisions, considered to incur high return on investment is the retirement communities of the country. Altos del Maria is a gated mountain community which is known for offering all the comforts required for an ideal life.

The real estate Panama has seen a boon as number of important banking centers and international banks are also present in the region. This gives a person peace of mind for accessing money any time. Besides, the revenue from the Panama Canal has added to the development of the infrastructure of the country. The number of restaurants and international standard shopping centers also add to the real estate sector of the country. Thus, investing and living in this beautiful country has resulted in maximum profits.

For more information, please visit www.altosdelmaria.com

Panama Property: A good investment decision

A popular tourist destination, Panama attracts travelers throughout the year, from across the globe. However, over the period of time, this beautiful place has also become a popular residential destination. There are ample of Panama Real Estate options available, including beach houses, farm houses and bungalows, to name a few. Among the several reasons that have increased the popularity of Panama property, its pleasant climate, beautiful surroundings and availability of requisite facilities played crucial role.

Individuals can choose from different Panama Real Estate communities, such as El Valle, Buena Vista, Los Canjilones and Altos del Maria. Amongst these, the Panama propertyin Altos del Maria has gained immense popularity among investors, especially those looking for affordable homes after retirement. The gated mountain community of Altos del Maria is located close to the Panama City, in the vicinity of mountain, beaches, valley and green belt. The international airport is also located nearby, just 90 minutes away; facilitating easy travel to the community. Its pleasant spring climate throughout the year is another favorable factor that attracts individuals.

The Panama Real Estate boasts of state-of-the-art infrastructure and facilities that add to the convenience of residents. There are shops, medical centers, round-the-clock commutation facility, leisure venues and other amenities. In addition, there are observation decks, beautiful parks, hiking trails, discos, pubs and swimming pools, among others. Individuals can also indulge in a wide range of exciting activities, such as horse riding, bird watching, mountaineering and boating. The nearby beaches, namely Gorgona and Coronado, are quite popular among residents. Along with the availability of all the requisite amenities, round-the-clock surveillance for safety of residents and low cost of living have facilitated investment in Panama property.

For more information, visit www.altosdelmaria.com

Panama Real Estate- Booming Investment Sector

Panama, a Latin American country, is located in Central America and is known for its diversity of flora and fauna. The major highlights of the country include scenic mountains, pleasing landscapes and Panama Canal. Owing to its natural environment and pleasant climate, people from different countries come to visit this mesmerizing destination. Panama is gaining recognition all across the globe not only for its growing tourism sector and international banking hub but for the tremendous rise in Panama realestate.

The county has witnessed rapid developed in number of homes and residential complexes, which provide individuals with an opportunity to make Panama real estate investments. Individuals opting to invest in are assured excellent return benefits in future. Among several other real estate Panama options, Altos de Maria is one of the most suitable places for foreigners, who wish to settle in this beautiful country. Located at an elevation of 1400 to 3500 feet above sea level, this mountainous paradise offers an ideal harmonized environment for perfect living. In addition to all basic amenities, there are several facilities available within the community including supermarkets, shopping complexes and golf courses. Assuring a comfortable living, this community is facilitated with the provision of a satellite connection gives access to all major TV channels along with high speed broadband Internet connection.

Residents of real estate Panama can also visit two most beautiful beaches of the country, Gorgona and Coronado, which are located in the proximity. Individuals can purchase the homes of this community from Panama real estate agents in accordance with their preference and budget.

Comfortable living in the Panama valley

Situated amidst panoramic mountain ranges, oceans and a green belt of vegetation, the residential communities of Panama has been a treat to all the nature's lovers. In order to develop this region and make it fit for living, many real estate agencies have come up with their plans and strategies. Melo group which is one such real estate agency, has been serving the Panama real estate for 25 years and owing to its efforts many residences are being established in this region. Altos del maria which is one of their flourishing residential communities consists of quality constructed residences. These residences are blessed by all the modern means of infrastructure and facilities that make living in these communities a memorable one for the people.

Not only in the development of residential communities, Panama real estate agencies have also contributed in other aspects also. This include development of 11 miles of nature's trail with suspension bridges, stairways, walkways and many more. Such arrangements in the Panama valley also provides a scope for various recreational activities like hiking, horse-back riding and swimming in various natural pools.

Over the time,Panama has attracted a lot of foreign tourists and for their convenience, the real estate agencies have made all the necessary arrangements related to accommodation, meals and various other things. Owing to this, Panama real estate sector consists of popular and fine restaurants, residences and many commercial places. In order to offer them with the best of recreational facilities, the real estate agencies have also incorporated several golf courses in this region. Considering each and every factor of the communities of this region, it can be said that living has been utmost comfortable.

Panama – Providing Real Estate Business

Panama is one of the best places in the world to invest in real estate business or to spend a perfect vacation. Owing to immense beauty and appealing scenic views of this place, it has attracted people from all over the world. Located in peaceful environment of Central America, this place is known for upbringing houses in close proximity to nature which also suits the budget of several individuals. The governing authorities of Panama real estate offer facilities like easy financing to assist the budget of investor.

Many communities in this country are engaged in real estate business, providing huge profits to the investors. Altos Del Maria is one such community engaged in offering houses to the investors. This community sprawls around a vast area of 7000 acres and has equipped its houses with all the basic amenities. Its main subdivisions are Granada, La Rioca, Santiago Apostol and Asturias. The house constructed by these subsidiaries varies from 1000 meters to 8000 meters. These houses in Panama are surrounded by appealing views, beautiful valleys, green belt, mountains and the Atlantic Ocean.

Besides this, the Panama real estates also offer certain facilities like potable water, wireless internet, electricity and DTH connection. In order to ensure the complete safety of residents in Panama real estate, the authorities have adopted stringent security measures. Trained security guards are hired to ensure 24x7 safety within the premises. Moreover, they also restrict entry of unknown persons and ensure that the outsider will be allowed only after attaining permission from that specific resident for which he is concerned.

Panama Real Estate: Heaven on earth

To offer world-class residential, holidaying and investment solution to the people around the world, Panama gated mountain community is a perfect destination. With ultramodern facilities and scenic beauty, this place is heaven for people, who want peaceful yet enjoyable life. Located in proximity to Panama City and Pacific coast beaches, Panama Real Estate is liked by both adventure and nature loving people. The place has best golfing and shopping facilities that is equally enjoyed by young and elderly crowd. Panama Real Estate is developed by Grupo Melo Altos de Vistamares, S.A, which is a renowned name in real estate development for more than 25 years that has helped us gain trust & confidence of people investing in the estate.

Panama development spreads across an area of 7000+ acres, with mesmerizing views including green belt, Pacific Ocean views and panoramic mountain valley, which are treat to the eyes of nature lovers. People can enjoy pleasant spring climate of (75º F) 24ºC throughout the year, along with pollution free environment and breathtaking views of waterfalls and rivers.

Clients can avail different types of apartments on various altitudes as per their needs. Both residential lots and Panama houses are available, which can be availed at affordable prices. With modern infrastructure facilities comprising paved roads, observation decks, vast common areas and close by shopping malls, this place is convenient place to spend rest of ones' life.

Owing to its fast pace development and low cost of living, Real Estate Panama is worth investing, as it promises to avail huge profits in future. Guarded by trained and 24x7 alert security personnel, this place is safe, secure and peaceful to live ones' life freely.

Real Estate Panama – For A Peaceful Living
